name: Idiopathic Retroperitoneal Fibrosis with Ureteral Obstruction
chief_complaint: I have severe back pain and it hurts when I urinate. I also feel very tired all the time.
prognosis: Variable; depends on early intervention. May progress to chronic kidney disease if untreated.
description: A rare condition characterized by progressive fibrosis of retroperitoneal tissue that often encases and compresses the ureters, leading to obstructive uropathy. Etiology is unknown in idiopathic cases, though some may be associated with IgG4-related disease.
multiple_choice: Idiopathic Retroperitoneal Fibrosis with Ureteral Obstruction
